text_block_list.text:
One day, as I was heading to the 
trainer's office…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
『The heavens, Yui, and I 
alone……I'll beat you!!』

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
That's kinda weird. Let's 
do it a little more… ”I'll 
beat you to a pulp!!”

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Wait a minute, don't tell anyone, 
okay?! It's stupid to be able to 
watch cool practice!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Besides, it's actually way cooler 
than that. I didn't even finish it!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, it's a scene from one 
of my favorite delinquent manga. 
I swear on Gekokujou and declare 
war on the top.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
“I'm the only one in the whole 
world who can do this!”

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
But it's kinda different when I 
say it… Maybe it's not wild enough…
choice_data_list: Why don't you make it look wild?

Why don't you try striking 
a wild pose?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Look at what they look like…! So 
that's what they're up to! That's 
right, those guys from the manga 
are really mad!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
You might be able to tell what 
kind of world she's looking at!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Alright, alright! I'm gonna get a 
little excited! Thanks!

After that, I heard a rumor that 
Vodka was working out at the gym.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
A wild pose, huh……? That was 
definitely a cool pose……

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Like this? Or like this? Would 
you prefer this? You're striking 
a surprisingly pose! Don't 
use your muscles!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'm so excited! I'm gonna go get a 
mirror! Thanks!

It looked like Vodka's research 
into poses had been 
enthusiastically conducted until 
late at night.
